ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We want to thank Tomasz Bojarczuk, Kinga Nowak-Dyjeta and the rest of the employees from Institute of Dendrology (Kórnik, Poland) of the Polish Academy of Sciences; Tomasz Nowak from Arboretum Wojsławice, branch of Wrocław University Botanical Garden; and Łukasz Janik and Antoni Bujwid and Eugeniusz Stanisławski from Leśnictwo Szczodre of Nadleśnictwo Oleśnica Śląska (Szczodre, Poland) for their help with the collection of aspen and poplar samples. We would also like to thank the beekeepers, Tomasz Strojny and Stefan Mikołajewski for collecting the propolis samples.
